name: You are sleeping.
desc:
Some fierce monsters are after you.
Use 🌀 Roll to avoid their attacks.

name: A demon appeared.
desc:
Use 🎯 Attack or they will strike first.
Others often react to your actions.
message: It got too close and hit you

name: Always think first.
desc:
Do not 🌀 Roll to dodge swift attacks.
Avoid 🛡 Blocking heavy blows.

name: Eat and pick up loot.
desc:
🖐 Grab loot and 💤 Rest frequently.
Beware! Some items may trick you.

name: You are awake.
desc:
You don't recognise your surroundings.
It almost felt like an eternal slumber.

name: Tiny Worm
desc:
Mindin' its own business.
Should you interfere?

name: Dire Rat
desc:
*sniffs around maniacally*
*runs towards you*

name: Spiky Hedgehog
desc:
At first it looked like a stone.
Then it started moving.

name: Fern Bush
desc:
It is covered with an interesting pattern.
Hopefully it's not toxic.

name: Suspicious Mushroom
desc:
You don't recognise this species.
Could it be poisonous?

name: Alpha Boar
desc:
Its loud stomps follow you around.
No matter what you do.

name: Boar Meat
desc:
Hmm. Maybe you could make use of it.
Sadly there's no fire around.
message: That raw meat made you really sick

name: Abandoned Tent
desc:
Nice and cozy place to rest.
You could use a break.

name: Roasted Chicken
desc:
It is still hot and untouched.
Who would leave it like that?

name: Sharp Axe
desc:
The owner could be nearby.
I'd rather not mess with it.
message: You took it to use it as a weapon

name: Swarm of Bees
desc:
No matter what you do.
You stay totally surrounded.

name: Sweet Honeypot
desc:
Yum. This would finely refresh you.
You wonder where it came from.

name: Rabid Raccoon
desc:
A little cute drooling boy.
Aaaw. Look at him.

name: Angry Ram
desc:
It must have lost its herd.
And it's not happy about it.

name: Wild Carrot
desc:
Sometimes even the simplest things
can heal your body and soul.

name: Forest Skunk
desc:
This one is fast and stinky.
Eww...

name: Pine Tree
desc:
Hmm. A tree in a forest.
You never noticed it before.

name: Friendly Owl
desc:
Why is there an owl during daytime?
You should investigate.
message: It revealed you a powerful secret

name: Gigantic Snake
desc:
Wow! This guy has been eatin' a lot.
Maybe you could use it as a rope.

name: Snake Egg
desc:
You wonder how it tastes.
There's only one way to find out.

name: Stray Dog
desc:
It doesn't look too friendly.
Maybe don't pet it.

name: Rose Flower Bush
desc:
These are just beautiful.
You should grab some.
message: Ouch! It has a lot of thorns

name: Irritable Goat
desc:
It looks bursting with anger.
Better avoid it's attacks.

name: Sentient Fox
desc:
It doesn't seem scared of you.
Could it be friend?
message: It gave you a forest agility training

name: Mighty Deer
desc:
It must be really strong.
Better be very careful.

name: Old Wolf
desc:
It walks slowly towards you.
Hopefully it's not hungry.

name: Cursed Bow
desc:
It lays besides a dead hunter.
He probably won't miss it.
message: You shot yourself by a mistake

name: Oak Tree
desc:
Another tree in a forest.
Who would have thought.

name: Cinnamon Cookie
desc:
You wonder who could have lost it.
It looks unspoiled and tasty.

name: Honey Badger
desc:
It looks fairly angry.
Maybe it was its cookie.

name: Bottomless Hole
desc:
You wonder whats in there.
Maybe some treasure?

name: Pile of Bones
desc:
You stumbled over someone's remains.
This doesn't look like an accident.

name: Invisible Creature
desc:
You feel like something is crawling around.
Hopefully not some hungry beast.

name: Fuzzy Wolf
desc:
It winds up for fatal strike.
You'd better avoid it.

name: Invisible Creature
desc:
Something is crawling around again.
What is happening here?

name: Fuzzy Wolf
desc:
It winds up for fatal strike.
You'd better avoid it.

name: Tired Old Man
desc:
What? It was a man all along?
How is that even possible?

name: Ancient Scroll
desc:
Some say these will make you blind.
There's only one way to find out.

name: Unknown Potion
desc:
It is glowing in the dark.
You probably shouldn't drink it.
message: It left a funny taste in your mouth

name: Giant Web
desc:
Hopefully nobody's home.
It seems quite sturdy.
message: You entangled yourself and hit fell

name: Eight-legged Menace
desc:
It looks like it's waiting for you.
There is no turning back now.

name: Spooky Spirit
desc:
Always appears out of nowhere.
A little bit more scary at night.

name: Wrinkled Map
desc:
You stumbled upon an old map.
There are some notes around the edges.

name: Animated Dead
desc:
It surely carries lot of diseases.
You'd better keep your distance.

name: Engraved Ring
desc:
It says "My Precious" on the inside.
That sounds promising.
message: Ouch! The ring is too tight

name: Rattling Skeleton
desc:
It makes crackling sounds.
How can it even move?.

name: Engagement Ring
desc:
It could still warm someone's heart.
Or at least fill their pocket.
message: You felt a surge in your chest

name: Screaming Bat
desc:
Its screams echo around the crypt.
You got goosebumps.

name: Massive Scorpion
desc:
This looks like the final challenge.
You must take it down.

name: Scorpion King Crown
desc:
This is where it ends for now.
Stay tuned for updates!
